sn35.111:1: "Bhikkhus, without directly knowing and fully understanding the eye,[n.93] This sutta and the next closely resembleSN35.26.without developing dispassion towards it and abandoning it, one is incapable of destroying suffering. Without directly knowing and fully understanding the ear … the mind, without developing dispassion towards it and abandoning it, one is incapable of destroying suffering. But by directly knowing and fully understanding the eye … the mind, by developing dispassion towards it and abandoning it, one is capable of destroying suffering."sn.iv.90
